metadata.dc:title: Matthews et al (2016) GPlates Reconstruction
metadata.dc:creator: Kara Matthews
metadata.dc:subject: empty
metadata.dc:description: The Matthews et al. (2016) reconstruction model combines the 0-230 Ma reconstructions of Müller et al (2016) with the 410-250 Ma reconstructions of Domeier and Torsvik (2014) to produce a continuous model of plate motions, with topological plate boundaries, that spans the entire 0-410 Ma period.
metadata.dc:source: Matthews, K.J., Maloney, K.T., Zahirovic, S., Williams, S.E., Seton, M., Müller, R.D., 2016. Global plate boundary evolution and kinematics since the late Paleozoic, Global and Planetary Change, 146, 226-250.
